#include <com_exceptions.h>

Public Member Functions

 IOException (std::string msg, bool print=true, std::ostream &stream=std::cerr)

Detailed Description

Exception class for IO exceptions, for instance errors while opening files, or write/read errors.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool  print = true,
std::ostream &  stream = std::cerr 
)

Constructor for IOException class.

Parameters:
msg The message to print/store.
print Set to true if you want to print the message to stream. Default is true.
stream The stream to print msg to. Default is std::cerr.
